name: Fishtastic - The Adventures of Kailax
description:
Fishtastic - The Adventures of Kailax

Kailax is the coolest salmon in his river

One day something horrible happened: Kailax was kidnapped!

He was dropped in the ocean. Lost in a terrifying place he is desperate to find his way back home.

Can you help him? Or will he be doomed to swim in the big ocean forever? :scream:

How to play
- W - up
- A - left
- S - down
- D - right

Team
- Emil (limered) - Movement, Physics, Special Effects, Programming
- Sven (justsWn) - UI, Sound
- Michi (ryupold) - Animation, Special Effects, Movement, Programming, Level Generation
- Helen - Content Creator, Design, Level Generation

We hope you enjoy playing our game!
Greetings from Germany :smiley:
